id.description: Primary key that uniquely identifies this list. Generated by Klaviyo.

updated.description: Date and time when the list was last updated, in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.mmmmmm)

relationships.description: Relationships to other resources that are related to this list

links.description: Relationships to other resources that are related to this list

name.description: A helpful name to label the list

opt_in_process.description: The opt-in process for this list. Could be either 'single_opt_in' or 'double_opt_in'.

created.description: Date and time when the list was created, in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.mmmmmm)

updated.description: Date and time when the list was last updated, in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.mmmmmm)
